label: creationDateTime
comment: The creation date, time, date time, or other date time value for this payment trade settlement.

domainIncludes.comment: The information that enables the reconciliation of a payment with the item(s) that the payment is intended to settle, for example a commercial invoice.
The set of characteristics shared by all individual transactions grouped for this financing request document.
A detailed statement of work, prices, and dimensions for this valuation.
